snippet: TERMINE--Charles M.,M.D., passed away on March 30, 2016 of Port St. Lucie, FL. (formerly of Manhasset). Beloved husband of Eleanor Termine. Loving father of Regina Termine of Albertson, NY and Michael C. Termine of Menifee, CA. Cherished grandfather of two. Visitation will be held at Fairchild Funeral Chapel, 1570 Northern Blvd., Manhasset on Tuesday from 3-5pm and 7-9pm. Funeral Mass Wednesday, 10am at St. Mary's Church, Manhasset. Interment St. John's Cemetery, Middle Village. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  TERMINE, CHARLES M.
